header.controlapp: Control your money on the go! with the app.

hero.title: One place to control your money
hero.description: Join our growing community of people who get to control their finances with BlitzBudget.We're offering complete control over your data, highest security and affordable services.

one.title: Connect your bank account
one.description: Automatically track all your transactions by connecting all your bank accounts.

secondcard.title: Import from bank statements
secondcard.description: Import all your transactions from you bank statement with one click.

thirdcard.title: Share your portfolio with others
thirdcard.description: Spending together? Share your portfolio with others.

shape.title: Step 1
shape.li1: Create as many wallets based on your currency.
shape.li2: Connect to your bank accounts to automatically sync all your transactions.
shape.li3: Connect your E-Wallets to BlitzBudget for a complete overview.

shape.li2: Understand where your money goes and what you are left with.
shape.li3: Analyze over expenditure for every category.
shape.li4: Mold your budget's to balance your goals and spending.

shape.li1: Plan your goals for repayment, investment or financial security.
shape.li2: Analyze your progress, get notified in advance to stay tuned to your goals.
shape.li3: Repay your debts, Build your account balance and Achieve your goals.
